biotools.summary: DDIMDL is a multimodal deep learning framework for predicting drug-drug interaction events. DDIMDL builds multimodal deep learning framework with multiple features of drugs to predict drug-drug-interaction (DDI) events.

bioschemas.name: DDIMDL
bioschemas.summary: DDIMDL is a multimodal deep learning framework for predicting drug-drug interaction events. DDIMDL builds multimodal deep learning framework with multiple features of drugs to predict drug-drug-interaction (DDI) events.
